name: Groundwork Command Line
short_description: A set of python scripts to provide command-line access to GroundWork Open Source. gwcmd allows to perform operations from commandline, and from remote servers.

license.fullpath: License :: OSI-Approved Open Source :: GNU General Public License version 3.0 (GPLv3)
